result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Total and Annualized Return Over Multiple Years** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(505) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false library(webexercises) p1 <- rnorm(1, mean = 100, sd = 10) p2 <- rnorm(1, mean = 130, sd = 10) div <- rnorm(1, mean = 3, sd = 1) years <- sample(1:5, 1) ``` ::: You bought a stock for \$**88.79** per share and sold it for \$**117.18** after **3** years. You received \$**0.96** in dividends per year. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Total return = (p2 − p1 + div × years)/p1 × 100 = **35.22**%.
::: ::: {.question-block}
✅ Annualized return (CAGR) = [((p2 + div × years)/p1)^(1/years) − 1] × 100 = **10.58**%.
::: :::
